description: You'll love everything about this healthier roast chicken dinner - it's easy to cook, is full of flavour, and there's next to no washing up.
keywords: Healthier One-Pot Chicken With Roast Vegetables
name: Healthier One-Pot Chicken With Roast Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup Macro Organic Spanish extra virgin olive oil
1.2 kg Macro free range whole chicken

recipeInstructions.text: Roast for 50 minutes or until browned and until juices run clear when thickest part of thigh is pierced with a skewer. Cover loosely with foil. Set aside for 15 minutes to rest. Serve with remaining thyme sprigs and extra lemon halves.
